clear_requirements.text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria
Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges
Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents
Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state
Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state
Creating future state architecture for Flowmart
Create a engagement plan & Approach: Implementation Strategy, possible risks, Challenges, Approach, and cutover strategy.
Create an implementation, Future Feature / Capability Roadmap
Assess and Analyze Phases:
Detail program objectives and qualitative and quantitative success metrics
Engage key stakeholders from different departments to understand their data needs and challenges
Conduct interviews or workshops to gather insights into current frustrations or limitations with existing data and analytics tools and processes?
Gathering feedback from IT, SMEs, and business users will help uncover any pain points or roadblocks within your current environment.
Business Units and Business Processes to be supported
Future state features and capabilities
Disposition of current features / capabilities, especially legacy features.
Scope inclusive for all Small Commercial system like – Select, Ag, NL/NF.
Understand approved enterprise architecture standards and guidelines, and compliance requirements
Understand approved products, platforms and tools
Capture Flows and dependencies
Current Business Processes captured as Information Flows and System Flows.
Systems integrated with Flowmart and how data flows into Flowmart.
Current consumers of Flowmart and how they consume data from Flowmart.
Current Technology Architecture and Landscape.
Pain Points, Constraints and Opportunities.
Regulatory and Compliance requirements.
Assess security requirements for Flowmart, including access control and encryption.
Future state Business Processes and Technical Capabilities.
Assess dependencies and interdependencies with upstream and downstream systems.
Systems and Consumers likely impacted

A deep dive into the data sources and infrastructure will provide visibility into what information is available and how it is currently being analyzed to identify opportunities to better leverage existing data.
Build High level source to target mapping and flow
Analyzing the quality, accuracy, and integrity of the data stored within the system and proposing measures to ensure data consistency​
Review and evaluate the current data platform architecture.
Define how it will interact with master data from different sources.
Current Governance model and issues
Guiding Principles such as scalability, security, interoperability, and user experience (for consumers of data).
Reference Architecture with focus on event based and data products architecture.
Application of Well Architected Guidelines and Principles (Performance Efficiency, Security, Operational Excellence, Reliability, Cost Optimization/FinOps, Sustainability).
Decompose Reference Architecture into design patterns.
Map design patterns to appropriate run time products and tools.
Data Strategy, Data Architecture, Modeling and Mapping.
Technology Stack Fitment consistent with Travelers approved products, platforms and tools.
Implementation Strategies and Options.
Risks and Challenges.
Data Migration Approach with potentially a phased migration that includes a pilot/test environment before full-scale deployment.
Transition and Cut Over strategies.
Post Implementation Support needs.
Post Implementation Training / Re-training needs.
Change Management Planning.
Provide Future Feature / Capability Roadmap
Create Feature / Capability Prioritization along with Traveler stakeholders
High Level Future State Architecture approved by Travelers IT
Develop a preliminary timeline & milestone for the Flowmart Modernization implementation, including data migration.
Ensure alignment with the organization's broader engagement timelines and objectives
High-level cost ROM estimate for implementation, including Tools and technologies
Get Required Access to Systems/Documents
Workshop with Business / Application Teams of SCBP, Select, PPL PIF and Analytics to understand the data feeds
Workshop to Understand current capacity, capabilities & Governance/operating model of different team
Survey and interview with key critical applications owners
Identification of Challenges & Pain Points
Workshop with Business / Application Teams to understand Data Needs / Reporting Requirements from FlowMart
Survey and interview with key critical applications owners
Identification of Challenges & Pain Points
Workshop / Meetings to understand process of meeting current demand, current state of technology & infrastructure; data connectivity, assets, catalogue and desirable features.
Understanding of Current Tools, Data Model, Data Policy across Data Value Chain
Preparation of Data Needs / Reporting Requirements List
List of challenges around existing process, resource capability & capacity, Governance/Existing Operating Model

Preparation of As-Is Tech. Landscape including Capabilities assessment across all pillars including Data Architecture, Data Consumption Layers, Catalog, Ingestion, Prescriptive Analytics, Cloud Maturity, and the respective prioritization
Categorizing the Data Needs as per Business Departments / Data Types Frequency / Criticality etc.
Analyzing the Existing Data Sources, Application Platforms & Integration to produce future planning
Discoverability and Provisioning of Technology Tooling, People & Capacity required
Technical Capabilities Mapping to meet the Data Needs – Final / To-Be Tech Stack Assessment, Data Model Assessment, Security & Compliance Assessment
Conducting Gap Analysis on the above two pointers to ensure the needs of future are met
Study on the implication of change management for the overall transformation
Preparation of To-Be Technology Landscape / Enterprise Architecture
Define key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure success and effectiveness of FlowMart Implementation
Budgetary estimates to realize this Roadmap
High-level business case with benefits and investments
Recommendation on To-Be process/Operating Model
Recommendation on FlowMart Data Strategy Across Data Value Chain
Roadmap (Interim / Long Term) for catering to the prioritized data needs
Future roadmap and High-level architecture for FlowMart Modernization
High-level cost ROM estimate for implementation, including Tools and technologies
Develop a preliminary timeline & milestone for the implementation of FlowMart Modernization.
Ensure alignment with the organization's broader engagement timelines and objectives
Risks and Mitigation Plan for successful implementation
Roadmap for Quick Wins
Key performance indicators (KPIs) to measure success and effectiveness of FlowMart Modernization.

questions.question: Can you please provide specific examples of key performance indicators (KPIs) that will be used to measure the success of this modernization effort, focusing on both quantitative and qualitative measures?
questions.context: Understanding concrete KPIs is crucial for defining acceptance criteria and tracking progress. This helps ensure the project aligns with business expectations.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: Are there any specific financial metrics, such as ROI or cost reduction targets, associated with the business goals and objectives? If so, what are the target values and how will they be measured?
questions.context: Financial metrics help to quantify the business value and justify the project's investment. Understanding these metrics helps in defining the scope of the solution and designing features that contribute to ROI.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: What are the acceptable thresholds for performance improvements (e.g., transaction processing time, data retrieval speed) that would be considered a success? Please provide specific numerical targets.
questions.context: Quantifiable performance targets are essential for designing and testing the system. This avoids ambiguity in defining 'success'.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: What are the key business processes this modernization effort aims to improve? Please provide specific process names and a brief description of their current inefficiencies.
questions.context: Identifying target processes allows us to focus development efforts on areas that will have the greatest impact and understand dependencies between processes.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: What are the expected non-functional requirements (e.g., security compliance, availability, scalability) that the modernized system must meet? What are the specific compliance standards that apply? What is the minimum acceptable uptime?
questions.context: Non-functional requirements directly impact the architecture and technology choices. Understanding these requirements early prevents costly rework.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: What are the strategic goals beyond the immediate modernization effort? Are there plans for future expansion, new business lines, or integration with other systems that we should consider in the architecture design?
questions.context: Understanding long-term strategic goals allows us to design a scalable and adaptable architecture that can accommodate future growth and change.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: Considering the need to engage stakeholders, what is the best approach for organizing interviews to understand data needs and challenges (REQ-02)? Are there specific stakeholders with whom we should prioritize meeting initially?
questions.context: This question clarifies the approach to stakeholder engagement, ensuring efficient use of time and resources by targeting key individuals early on.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: Regarding the current state assessment (REQ-03), what are the known limitations or gaps in the existing documentation of data sources, infrastructure, and mapping documents? Are there any subject matter experts we should consult to fill these gaps?
questions.context: Understanding documentation gaps allows us to plan for data discovery and knowledge acquisition activities during the assessment phase.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: What is the relative importance of the qualitative vs. quantitative success metrics (REQ-10)? Are there specific examples of qualitative improvements you are hoping to see (e.g., improved user satisfaction, faster onboarding)?
questions.context: Understanding the relative weight of different types of success metrics helps prioritize development efforts and select appropriate technologies.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: Are there any known regulatory constraints or industry best practices that influence the business goals and objectives? Please provide specifics.
questions.context: Regulatory and industry standards dictate certain design choices and may require specific functionalities.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: What constitutes 'success' from the perspective of the end-users of the system being modernized? What are their biggest pain points with the current system?
questions.context: Understanding user perspectives ensures the modernization effort addresses their needs and improves their experience.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: Are there any pre-existing architectural standards or technology preferences within Travelers that need to be considered, beyond the general EA guidelines mentioned?
questions.context: Ensuring compliance with Travelers' internal standards simplifies integration and reduces the risk of compatibility issues.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: What is the expected frequency of reporting on progress towards achieving the business goals and objectives, and to whom should these reports be directed?
questions.context: Establishing reporting cadence ensures transparency and allows stakeholders to track progress.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: Beyond the high-level business goals, are there specific 'quick wins' or easily achievable improvements that can be implemented early in the project to demonstrate value and build momentum?
questions.context: Identifying 'quick wins' can help build stakeholder confidence and demonstrate the benefits of the modernization effort early on.
questions.source_text: Understand the business goals, objectives and success criteria

questions.question: Which specific departments and stakeholder roles should be prioritized for interviews given the overall project goals and the need to understand diverse data perspectives?
questions.context: Helps prioritize stakeholder engagement and ensures we capture the most relevant data needs. Relates to REQ-11 and REQ-01.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: What are the current methods used by stakeholders to access and utilize data, including specific tools, reports, and dashboards? Please provide examples.
questions.context: This helps understand the current state and identify potential integration points and pain points. Relates to REQ-03.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: Can you provide examples of data-related challenges stakeholders currently face, such as data quality issues, accessibility problems, or performance bottlenecks?
questions.context: Uncovers specific problems and areas for improvement, allowing for targeted solutions.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: What are the expected outcomes from these stakeholder interviews? Specifically, what decisions or actions will be informed by the gathered insights?
questions.context: Clarifies the purpose of the interviews and ensures the collected data is actionable.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: What data governance policies and standards, if any, currently exist within the organization that may impact data access, usage, or transformation?
questions.context: Identifies potential constraints and ensures compliance with existing policies.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: Are there any pre-existing documentation or data dictionaries that can be leveraged to understand current data sources and their structure before the interviews begin?
questions.context: Reduces interview time and allows for more targeted questions. Relates to REQ-03.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: What is the anticipated level of stakeholder participation and availability for interviews, and how should we schedule and manage these interactions effectively?
questions.context: Addresses practical considerations and ensures efficient use of stakeholder time.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: What is the preferred format for documenting the data needs and challenges identified during stakeholder interviews (e.g., structured questionnaire, free-form notes, video recordings)?
questions.context: Ensures consistency and facilitates analysis of interview data.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: What tools (e.g., surveys, collaborative documents) are permitted or preferred for data gathering and documentation from stakeholders?
questions.context: Aligns with the company's IT policies. Involves collaboration with stakeholders to find their preference.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: How will data privacy and security be addressed during the interview process, especially when discussing sensitive data?
questions.context: Addresses compliance requirements and builds trust with stakeholders.
questions.source_text: Engage stakeholders by organizing interviews to understand the data needs and challenges

questions.question: Regarding the data sources, infrastructure, and mapping documents, can you provide a comprehensive list of all items that fall under the scope of 'deep diving'?
questions.context: Clarifies the scope of the assessment. Knowing the exact list of data sources, infrastructure components, and mapping documents helps define the effort and prevents scope creep.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: What specific tools and technologies are currently in use for data storage, processing, and transformation within the existing infrastructure? Please specify versions and configurations.
questions.context: Gathering technical details about the current technology stack helps in understanding the complexity of the assessment and in planning for future state integration.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: What is the expected level of detail for the 'mapping documents'? Are we expecting data lineage diagrams, ETL process flows, or other specific documentation types?
questions.context: Defines the deliverable expectation of the 'mapping documents' aspect of the requirement. Different documentation types require different effort levels.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: Who are the Subject Matter Experts (SMEs) for each of the identified data sources and infrastructure components that we can consult with during the deep dive?
questions.context: Identifies the stakeholders that will be needed for the assessment. Knowing who to contact will help expedite the process and ensure accurate information is gathered.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: Regarding data quality and accuracy (related to REQ-04), are there any existing data quality reports, metrics, or monitoring systems in place that we can leverage during our assessment?
questions.context: Establishes the current state of data quality monitoring, which will inform the effort required to fulfill REQ-04. It also helps determine what data quality tools we might need.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: Are there any existing data dictionaries or metadata repositories available that describe the data sources and their schemas?
questions.context: Determines if there is existing documentation available for data sources which can greatly reduce the effort and improves the accuracy of data understanding.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: Considering REQ-05 regarding enterprise architecture standards, where can we locate the relevant documents and who is the best contact to clarify any ambiguities within them?
questions.context: Identifies the location of the EA documents and the SME for clarification, ensuring alignment with enterprise standards and reducing potential rework later.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: What are the critical success factors for this 'current state assessment'? What specific metrics will be used to measure the success of this task?
questions.context: Establishes acceptance criteria for the deep dive assessment. Knowing what constitutes a successful assessment helps focus the effort and ensures alignment with stakeholder expectations.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: Are there any known limitations or constraints regarding access to specific data sources or infrastructure components?
questions.context: Uncovers potential roadblocks that could hinder the assessment. Knowing these limitations upfront allows for proactive planning and mitigation.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: What is the expected format and level of detail for the 'Needs Assessment Report' deliverable? Do you have an example report we can use as a template?
questions.context: Clarifies the deliverable expectations for the Needs Assessment Report, ensuring that it meets the client's requirements. A template can significantly reduce the development time and ensure correct formatting.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: What level of historical data needs to be considered as part of the assessment? Are we looking at current data only, or a specific timeframe?
questions.context: Defines the scope of the data assessment. Understanding the historical data requirements helps define the workload and required storage considerations.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: Are there any compliance or regulatory requirements that need to be considered when assessing the data sources and infrastructure?
questions.context: Identifies compliance or regulatory factors affecting data governance and security requirements to be considered as part of the assessment.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: Regarding the stakeholder interviews (REQ-02), has a list of key stakeholders been identified, and what is the prioritized schedule for conducting these interviews?
questions.context: Links the current task with related requirement. It helps to align resources and scheduling needs effectively.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: How will the findings of this assessment be used in the subsequent phases of the project (e.g., future-state design, implementation)?
questions.context: Clarifies the purpose of the assessment and how it feeds into later phases. This ensures that the assessment is aligned with the overall project goals and that the deliverables are fit for purpose.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: Is there any existing documentation on current data migration or integration strategies that can be reviewed as part of the deep dive?
questions.context: Helps to understand current data migration strategies so that gaps and improvements can be identified during the modernization effort. Speeds up understanding current data transformation processes.
questions.source_text: Assess the current state by deep diving into data sources, infrastructure, mapping documents

questions.question: What specific data sources are in scope for analyzing data quality and accuracy?
questions.context: Clarifying the data sources ensures we focus our analysis on the relevant datasets, aligning with REQ-03 and defining the scope.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: What specific data quality dimensions (e.g., completeness, accuracy, consistency, timeliness, validity) are most important to Travelers for this project?
questions.context: Understanding the critical data quality dimensions allows us to prioritize our analysis and focus on the most relevant aspects, ensuring alignment with business needs identified in REQ-02.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: Are there existing data quality rules, validation processes, or profiling reports that we can leverage during the analysis? If so, where are they located?
questions.context: Leveraging existing resources will save time and effort and provide a baseline for comparison. This question aims to determine the tools, techniques and processes that Travelers currently uses and how they can be integrated into the assessment.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: What are the acceptable thresholds or tolerances for data quality issues (e.g., percentage of missing values, error rates)? What constitutes 'acceptable' data quality?
questions.context: Defining acceptable thresholds provides a clear benchmark for evaluating data quality and determining whether remediation is required. This will help determine the success criteria.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: How should data accuracy be verified? Are there authoritative sources or golden records available for cross-validation?
questions.context: Understanding the validation methods ensures the accuracy of our findings and provides a reliable basis for remediation efforts. This also touches on the 'deep diving into data sources' aspect of REQ-03.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: What is the anticipated volume of data that needs to be analyzed? Will we have access to representative samples or the entire datasets?
questions.context: Understanding data volume will inform the choice of analysis tools and techniques and help estimate the effort required. Also, confirms the resources needed to complete the analysis.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: Are there any specific data privacy or security constraints that we need to be aware of when accessing and analyzing the data? What data masking or anonymization techniques are required?
questions.context: Addressing privacy and security concerns ensures compliance with regulations and protects sensitive data. This also prevents potential security risks.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: How will the results of the data quality analysis be used? Will it be used to drive data cleansing efforts, inform data migration strategies, or something else?
questions.context: Understanding the intended use of the analysis results will help us tailor our analysis and recommendations to meet specific needs, and ensure the deliverables align to the ultimate business objectives.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: What tools and technologies are currently used for data management and analysis within Travelers' environment? Should we use these same tools for this data quality assessment?
questions.context: This ensures compatibility with existing infrastructure and simplifies the integration of our findings. This relates to the 'Assess the current state' portion of REQ-03.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: Who within Travelers will be responsible for reviewing and validating the data quality analysis findings?
questions.context: Identifying the responsible parties ensures clear communication and timely feedback. Clear responsibilities and ownership are crucial for a smooth project execution.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: To what extent are the Enterprise Architecture standards & guidelines defined, and how rigidly must the current state analysis adhere to these guidelines?
questions.context: Connects this requirement to REQ-05 and clarifies the degree of flexibility in documenting the existing data landscape. Highlights potential risks if the current state heavily violates EA guidelines.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: Are there any regulatory or compliance requirements that dictate specific data quality standards or reporting requirements?
questions.context: Ensures compliance and avoids potential legal issues. Identifies if the data quality analysis needs to meet any external benchmarks.
questions.source_text: Analyze the quality and accuracy of the data in the current state

questions.question: Could you please provide the specific documents related to enterprise architecture standards and guidelines that we need to review for Flowmart's future state? We need to ensure we're referencing the correct and most up-to-date versions.
questions.context: Ensures the team uses the correct documentation for enterprise architecture standards, preventing wasted effort on outdated or irrelevant guidelines. Clarifies exactly which documents are in scope.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: What are the key guiding principles of Travelers' enterprise architecture that should be considered when designing the Flowmart future state architecture?
questions.context: Understanding the guiding principles will ensure the design aligns with the broader organizational architecture vision.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: Are there specific architectural patterns (e.g., microservices, event-driven architecture) that are preferred or mandated by Travelers' enterprise architecture for applications like Flowmart? If so, please provide documentation or examples.
questions.context: Identifies architectural constraints and preferred patterns that must be followed, impacting technology choices and design decisions.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: What is the expected level of detail for the "Flowmart future state architecture" deliverable (REQ-06)? Should it be a high-level conceptual diagram, a more detailed logical architecture, or a physical architecture?
questions.context: Clarifies the deliverable expectations for REQ-06, preventing scope creep and ensuring the architecture meets the required level of granularity.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: What specific non-functional requirements (e.g., scalability, security, performance, availability) are most critical for Flowmart, and how do these relate to the enterprise architecture standards?
questions.context: Identifies key non-functional requirements that will drive architectural decisions and ensure the future state architecture meets business needs.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: Regarding the current-state assessment (REQ-03), what existing systems and data sources are considered to be in scope for Flowmart? Are there existing architectural diagrams or data flow documents that can be provided as starting points?
questions.context: Links the current-state assessment to the future-state architecture, ensuring the design takes into account existing systems and integrations. Helps avoid overlooking existing dependencies.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: How will the "Flowmart future state architecture" be validated against Travelers' enterprise architecture standards? Are there specific checklists or compliance procedures we need to follow?
questions.context: Defines the acceptance criteria for the future state architecture, ensuring it meets Travelers' standards and can be successfully deployed.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: Who is the designated enterprise architect at Travelers who can provide guidance and sign-off on the Flowmart future state architecture?
questions.context: Identifies the key point of contact for architectural guidance and approval, facilitating communication and ensuring alignment.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: What is the expected timeline for delivering the "Flowmart future state architecture" document? How does this timeline align with the timelines for REQ-06 and REQ-07 (Engagement Plan)?
questions.context: Clarifies the delivery timeline and dependencies, ensuring the architecture is completed in time for subsequent phases of the project.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: Are there any known security constraints or compliance requirements (e.g., PCI, HIPAA) that must be considered when designing the Flowmart future state architecture, and how do these constraints impact technology choices?
questions.context: Identifies potential security and compliance risks early in the design process, preventing costly rework later on.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: What are the preferred tools and technologies for documenting and visualizing the Flowmart future state architecture? (e.g. ArchiMate, UML, Visio)
questions.context: Ensures consistency in documentation and facilitates collaboration by using approved tools and technologies.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: Regarding data migration (covered in the implementation plan REQ-07), are there any limitations on data access or data transfer that need to be considered in the future state architecture? For example, can data be directly accessed from legacy systems, or does it need to be transformed first?
questions.context: Addresses data migration concerns early in the architectural design, preventing potential roadblocks during implementation.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: Are there any existing enterprise services or APIs within Travelers that Flowmart should leverage in the future state architecture, instead of building new functionality from scratch?
questions.context: Encourages reuse of existing assets and avoids redundant development efforts, promoting efficiency and consistency.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: To what extent should the Flowmart future state architecture address potential future expansion or integration with other systems not currently in scope?
questions.context: Clarifies the scope of the architecture and avoids over-engineering, focusing on current needs while considering potential future requirements.
questions.source_text: Understand and review documents related to enterprise architecture standards & guidelines to create Flowmart future state

questions.question: Regarding the Flowmart future state architecture, can you elaborate on the key business capabilities that Flowmart should support in the future?
questions.context: Understanding the future business capabilities will drive the design of the future state architecture and ensure it aligns with business objectives. This is related to understanding the broader context for REQ-06.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: What are the specific non-functional requirements (NFRs) such as performance, scalability, security, and availability that Flowmart's future state architecture needs to meet?
questions.context: NFRs are critical for designing a robust and reliable architecture. Knowing these upfront will avoid costly rework later. Directly relates to REQ-06's success.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: Referring to REQ-05, what specific enterprise architecture standards and guidelines should be strictly adhered to when designing the Flowmart future state architecture (e.g., naming conventions, security protocols, technology mandates)?  Can we have a documented list for clarity?
questions.context: Ensuring compliance with enterprise standards is crucial for maintainability, security, and integration. We need a clear list of constraints and standards.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: Regarding REQ-04 concerning data quality and accuracy analysis, what is the acceptable level of data quality that the future state architecture needs to maintain or improve upon? What are the critical data elements we should focus on?
questions.context: Data quality directly impacts the effectiveness of the future state system. Understanding the target data quality level will influence architecture decisions. This relates REQ-04 to REQ-06
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: Can you provide examples of 'well-architected frameworks' (mentioned in the overall deliverables) that Travelers prefers for designing the Flowmart future state architecture (e.g., AWS Well-Architected Framework, Azure Well-Architected Framework)?
questions.context: Using a standardized framework ensures best practices are followed and provides a structured approach to architecture design.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: What are the preferred technology stacks or platforms that Travelers wants to leverage for the Flowmart future state (e.g., cloud providers, programming languages, databases)? Are there any legacy systems that need to be integrated with?
questions.context: Understanding technology preferences and integration requirements will narrow down the design options and ensure compatibility.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: What level of detail is expected for the high-level future state architecture deliverable (REQ-53)? Should it include component diagrams, data flow diagrams, or infrastructure diagrams?
questions.context: Clarifying the expected level of detail will ensure the deliverable meets stakeholders' needs and expectations. It also helps in scoping the effort.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: What is the expected turnaround time for Travelers IT to review and approve the High-Level Future State Architecture (REQ-53)? How many iterations of review should we anticipate?
questions.context: Understanding the review process and expected timelines is crucial for planning and managing the project schedule. This addresses potential delays.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: Are there any specific regulatory or compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, HIPAA) that the Flowmart future state architecture needs to adhere to?
questions.context: Compliance requirements can significantly impact architecture decisions, especially around data security and privacy.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: What are the key performance indicators (KPIs) that will be used to measure the success of the Flowmart future state architecture after implementation? How will these KPIs be monitored and reported?
questions.context: Defining KPIs upfront allows us to design the architecture with performance monitoring in mind. Connects directly to the Business Objectives and Success Criteria deliverable.
questions.source_text: Creating future state architecture for Flowmart

questions.question: Regarding the Implementation Strategy, what are the preferred deployment models (e.g., phased rollout, big bang) and target environments (e.g., cloud, on-premise, hybrid)?

questions.target_stakeholder: Data Architect, Data Migration Lead, Business Analyst

questions.question: Beyond simply 'understanding' approved enterprise architecture standards, what is the process for handling deviations from those standards due to the specific needs or constraints of the Flowmart modernization, and what is the governance process for approving or rejecting such deviations? Additionally, can we get in writing acknowledgement that all approved products, platforms, and tools are suitable for the project's performance and scale requirements?
questions.context: While adhering to enterprise standards is important, modernization projects often require exceptions. A clear process for managing these deviations and documented suitability of chosen products is necessary to avoid delays and ensure the project's success and long-term maintainability. Unchecked deviations lead to integration nightmares and operational complexities.
questions.target_stakeholder: Enterprise Architect, Technical Lead, IT Governance Team

questions.question: What are the detailed security requirements and compliance regulations (e.g., PII, PCI, HIPAA) applicable to the Flowmart data, processing, and integrations, and how will these requirements be implemented and validated throughout the modernization process? What specific security tools and processes (e.g., penetration testing, vulnerability scanning, security audits) will be employed?
questions.context: Security and compliance are paramount, especially when dealing with sensitive data. Defining specific security requirements and validation procedures early on is critical to prevent breaches and avoid costly penalties. Lack of clarity can result in security vulnerabilities and non-compliance.
questions.target_stakeholder: Security Architect, Compliance Officer, Legal Counsel

questions.question: What are the specific success metrics for testing and quality assurance, and how will the supplier ensure comprehensive test coverage, including unit, integration, system, performance, and user acceptance testing? What tools and methodologies will be used for automated testing and continuous integration/continuous delivery (CI/CD)?
questions.context: Adequate testing and quality assurance are essential for delivering a reliable and functional system. Clearly defined success metrics and a comprehensive testing strategy are needed to minimize defects and ensure user satisfaction. Lack of focus on this leads to significant post-deployment issues.
questions.target_stakeholder: QA Lead, Test Manager, Technical Lead
